synopsis.text: Sanrio's charming creation, Hana, is a young rabbit with a burning desire for ballet. Her dreams take her to the prestigious ballet academy on Etoile Island, where she is surrounded by new faces, thrilling experiences, and an intriguing legend about a pair of red shoes. As Hana navigates through her new life, she uncovers the mystery of the red shoes while inching closer to her ultimate goal: transforming into a genuine ballerina. With each passing day, Hana embraces new adventures that fuel her passion for dance in "Usahana - Yumemiru Ballerina."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
